<a id="readme-top"></a>

# RecipeRocal – Gamified Nutrition & Recipe Tracking App

> **Academic Project | Texas A&M University (Jan 2024 – May 2024)**

> **Important Notice** \
> This project is **not a downloadable app** as time constraints did not allow for the push to Google Play. However, it is executable through a **Android emulator**.

> **DISCLAIMER** \
> This README file is still a work in-progress. Advanced details and setup/running instructions will soon follow.

---

[![LinkedIn][linkedin-shield]][linkedin-url]
[![Texas A&M University][tamu-shield]][tamu-url]

<div align="center">
  <img src="git_images/Logo.png" alt="RecipeRocal Logo" width="250" height="250">

  <h2>RecipeRocal</h2>
  <p><i>An Android mobile app that makes healthy eating engaging through gamification, goal tracking, and smart recipe discovery</i></p>
</div>
